channel.title: Karabiner Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 10.7.9
item.description:
About v10.7.9 Update

  • v10.7.9: KeyCode::VK_MOUSEKEY_* has been improved in edge case.
  • v10.7.8: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.7.7: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.7.6: Minor update.
  • v10.7.5: The following filters have been added.
    • <lastreleasedphysicalkey_only>
    • <lastreleasedphysicalkey_not>
    • <elapsedtimesincelastreleased_greaterthan>
    • <elapsedtimesincelastreleased_lessthan>
  • v10.7.4: AXNotifier supported new Alfred (Alfred 2.7.2).
  • v10.7.3: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.7.2: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.7.1: Prepared settings have been updated.
More
